entry.title: 120" Natural Tone Premium Chambury Ruffled Burlap Round Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 44.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Round Tablecloth
Material: Burlap
Color: Natural
Size: 120"
Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable. This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material.
Gives floor length hang on standard 5 ft (60") table
Ruffles are only on the edge of the tablecloth
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Introducing the Jute/Burlap Tablecloth that is sure to exude a classy taste while definitely blending in alongside the beautiful country look. Made with sturdy fabric and styled for a charming appeal, make sure to buy a few these for those outdoor bonding moments. This High-Quality linen has been studied and refined after the rare Chambury House linen masterpieces because when everything just has to be perfect, then perfection begins with Chambury Casa linens!

Additional Information:

  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
  • How to Care: Dry Clean Only

entry.title: 90x156" Natural Tone Chambury Casa Rustic Burlap Rectangle Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 32.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Rectangle Tablecloth
Material: Burlap
Color: Natural
Size: 90" x 156"
Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable. This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Augment the harmony of nature and pleasure by using our premium quality CHAMBURY CASA Fine Rustic Burlap Tablecloth in a truly natural tone. This sturdy fabric will efficiently handle the roughness and coarseness of natural surroundings. This simple, yet classy jute tablecloth can be accentuated with fabrics with more contemporary and earthly tones or pure white fabric and fine china.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Rectangle Tablecloth
  • Material: Burlap
  • Color: Natural
  • Size: 90" x 156"
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
  • How to Care: Dry Clean Only
  • Note: The smell can dissipate some by leaving in open air, but may still be noticeable. Please keep this in mind when ordering.

entry.title: 90" Black Round Velvet Flocking Design Taffeta Damask Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 10.99 - 125.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Round Tablecloth
Material: Taffeta bottom with velvet flocking design
Color: Black
Size: 90"
Seamless, 1pc design.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Our eye-catching taffeta flocking tablecloth is an ideal choice to dress up those lackluster table covers and old-fashioned tables. The seamless luster of high quality taffeta combined with the modish flocking design adds a chic appeal to these splendid tablecloths. Create a super classy table presentation with these stylish tablecloths spread elegantly atop your wedding or banquet tables. Pair these with our sparkling glitter accented table runners, centerpieces or vases for much exotic effect.

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Dry clean only.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
